attributes.action: stop  making big buisness out of elderly care homes with huge fees
attributes.additional_details:
purpose built care homes must be built, not converted hotels or houses
elderly care should be  run by the  goverment  as national  health.  not  big buisness.. stop charging huge fees that rob people  of life savings and all posesions in later life,  taking there homes and life savings away in a flash with huge fees making the owners rich then when occupent runs out of money out of tax payer.
should be illegal to evicte the person left behind in the care residents  own home if under 60. no matter how long lived there or who they are or  what ralation    to pay for care must be stopped now as we all getting old
must be stoped NOW
